name: Shadow - THE GAME (Level 3 & 5 Only)
description:
Three people made this full game, however the levels implemented in this version are only levels 3&5 made by me. full version coming soon!

Shadow is a Mythical/Medieval themed puzzle game based in Germany. The story starts in a Daub house where a theorist named Zane who is curious in mythological theories based on space and aliens. One day, a loud screech came from the outside which woke up Zane. He then checked outside to see what had made this noise and investigated it. He ended up following the noise and ended up at a castle. Zane was intrigued and ventured into the castle, to find out that the theories that he believed in were true… Zane then went to collect the evidence of what came from space; the pods with aliens inside and Crystals.
